title: South Africa's Zuma proclaims innocence after court appearance
text:
South Africa's Zuma proclaims innocence after court appearance 12:20pm BST - 00:55 
Jacob Zuma addressed his supporters at a rally outside Durban's High Court on Friday after it adjourned a corruption case against the former president. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Jacob Zuma addressed his supporters at a rally outside Durban's High Court on Friday after it adjourned a corruption case against the former president.
